stories.title: Clear stale Validate detail state to prevent flicker
stories.description: Reset Validate detail selection and view model state on dataset or route changes to avoid rendering stale detail content and brief blank states.
acceptance: Changing the selected skill or data source clears any previous detail view state before new content renders
Switching between Validate list items never shows a blank detail pane
No stale detail content appears when the underlying Validate dataset reloads

stories.title: Stabilize Sync list/detail loading lifecycle
stories.description: Make Sync list and detail panes resilient to async loading by ensuring a single source of truth for selection and loading state, with deterministic transitions.
acceptance: Sync list selection persists through background refresh without collapsing the detail view
Detail view renders a consistent loading/empty/error state without flicker
Async reloads do not trigger a full list/detail teardown

stories.title: Surface Search index errors and empty states
stories.description: Expose clear UI states for Search indexing failures and empty results so users understand what to do next.
acceptance: Search shows a dedicated error state when indexing fails, with actionable guidance
Search shows an explicit empty state when no results exist
Error and empty states are visually distinct from loading state

stories.title: Resolve disabled Security/Search actions
stories.description: Either implement the currently disabled Security/Search actions or remove them from the UI to avoid dead controls.
acceptance: All visible Security/Search actions are functional
Disabled controls are removed unless a concrete implementation is shipped
Any remaining unavailable actions provide a clear reason and next step
